description: "This map of the Sunda Islands features three different locations for the city of Palembang. ‘Palambam’ is in the correct location on Sumatra, while ‘Palimbam’ is in west Java, and ‘Palambang’ is in east Java, a confusion often seen at this time."
title: "The Sunda Islands vitz Borneo, Sumatra and Java & c. agreable to Modern History / by H. Moll."
